message: I'll take 99.999% of the money, you get $1. It's a small price to pay for the thrill of the game!
Let's split it 50/50, a fair and reasonable proposal
I'm not sure I want to give up my chance to negotiate further. Let's see what I can get in the next round.
You're running out of time and money, Bob! I'll give you a tiny bit, but I'm taking the lion's share!
I'll give you most of it, but I'm not going to go down without a fight!
Alright, Bob, you've made a decent offer. I'll take 75% of the original amount and call it a day.
